summary:
**Expansion Plans:** MLC announces plans to expand from 6 franchises to 8 in the near future and eventually to 10 teams.

**List A Status:** MLC has been awarded List A status by the International Cricket Council, recognizing it as an official T20 league and America's first world-class domestic tournament.

**Season Expansion:** MLC CEO Vijay Srinivasan plans to expand the season from 19 games in 2023 to 34 games by 2025.

**Schedule:** The second season will start at the end of the men's T20 World Cup and run for 23 days, overlapping with The Hundred. MLC aims to start its season in early June, creating a window from June to July.

**Implications:** The expansion plans may have significant implications for the professional cricket landscape in England, potentially clashing with the T20 Blast season and influencing the decision on private investment in The Hundred.

**Development:** MLC has established academies and a minor league system to develop local players and is working on developing more List A venues, aiming to build a robust cricket infrastructure in the US.

**Ambitions:** The ultimate goal is to have a strong USA cricket team, with a larger pool of players, a home-and-away format, and a robust set of venues around the country.

title: American League to compete with IPL for ICC competition: Shahrukh-Nadella’s association in MLC; Pakistan’s failure in PSL
body:
Read Also: England Clinches Series Victory

Early Investors and Launch of Major League Cricket (MLC)

The US Cricket Board has talked about starting a franchise-based cricket league in 2018. Overcoming the initial hurdles, $120 million i.e. about Rs one thousand crore was raised for the league in May 2022.

Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella, Shah Rukh Khan co-owned IPL franchise KKR, technology entrepreneur Anand Rajaraman, and former Adobe CEO Shantanu Narayan were among the early investors. The first season of the MLC was played in July 2023 with 6 teams. All the teams consisted of Indian investors. Actor Shah Rukh Khan is a co-owner of IPL franchise KKR, IndiaWin Sports, the company that runs Mumbai Indians (MI), GMR Sports, the owner of Delhi Capitals, and Chennai Super Kings bought teams with different partners.

Structure and Results of MLC’s First Season:

The first season of the MLC had 15 group-stage matches played between July 14 and July 26. The four playoff matches took place on July 27, 28 and 30. All 19 games were played at the Dallas and Morrisville stadiums. The group stage saw 6 teams playing 5-5 matches, i.e. one team played a 1-1 match with the other 5 teams.

Like the IPL, the first season of the MLC had the top-4 teams qualifying for the playoffs. MI New York played the final match after winning the Eliminator and Qualifier-2. The team defeated Seattle Orcas by 7 wickets in the final and won the title of the first season.

Nicholas Pooran scored a century, he was also the highest run-scorer in the tournament. MI’s Trent Boult took the highest number of 22 wickets. American Cameron Gannon was the Man of the Tournament by taking 11 wickets for Seattle Orcas.

Upcoming Second Season of MLC

The final match of the T20 World Cup will be held on June 29. Six days after this, the second season of MLC will start in America on July 6. This time also matches will be played in only 2 stadiums, but 21 matches will be played in the group stadium instead of 15. A team will play 7 matches instead of 5. Season 2 of MLC will start immediately after the World Cup, which will connect the global cricket audience with the American audience. The matches of the second season will start at 12:30 pm and 6 am Indian time. According to America, this time it will be night, so more fans will reach the stadium and watch the match.

Challenges for MLC in Competing with IPL:

The brand value of IPL is Rs 89 thousand crore, while the brand value of MLC is Rs 1 thousand crore. Rs 1,000 crore is spent on the salaries of players in IPL, while only Rs 57 crore is spent on the salaries of players in MLC.

While cricket is not among the top 10 most watched sports in America, no other sport is watched more than cricket in India. Major League Cricket (MLC) is currently in its initial stages, where 6 foreign players can play in the playing-11. In comparison, only 4 foreign players play in IPL. The biggest reason for the success of IPL in India is Indian players. Therefore, if MLC has to compete with IPL, it will first have to improve the quality of players in its country. Which now seems to take a lot of time.

The International Cricket Council approved List-A for Major League Cricket on May 28. This means that now the statistics of players and teams in this tournament will also be counted in T20 records. The second season of MLC will begin on July 6, just 6 days after the T20 World Cup.

In the second season, there will be an increase from 19 to 25 matches. It is planned to increase to 34 matches by 2025, increasing the number of teams from 6 to 8. The MLC chief executive said the MLC plans to eventually make it a 10-team tournament. Barring the IPL, no country has ever had 10 teams in any franchise tournament. It will be important to see how the T20 World Cup will affect Major League Cricket.
summary:
**Launch and Investors**: The MLC was launched in 2022 with an investment of $120 million from investors including Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella, Shah Rukh Khan, and others.

**First Season**: The first season of MLC was played in July 2023 with 6 teams, all owned by Indian investors. The season consisted of 15 group-stage matches and 4 playoff matches, with MI New York winning the title. Nicholas Pooran was the highest run-scorer, and Trent Boult took the highest number of wickets.

**Upcoming Second Season**: The second season of MLC will start on July 6, with 21 group-stage matches and 7 matches per team. The matches will be played in two stadiums, and the timing will be adjusted to attract more fans.

**Challenges**: MLC faces challenges in competing with the Indian Premier League (IPL), with a significant difference in brand value and player salaries. To succeed, MLC needs to improve the quality of American players.

**International Recognition**: The International Cricket Council approved List-A status for MLC, allowing player and team statistics to be counted in T20 records.

**Future Plans**: The MLC plans to increase the number of matches to 34 by 2025 and eventually become a 10-team tournament, a first for any franchise tournament outside of the IPL.

title: David Miller signs with new team ahead of new T20 season
body:
South African star batter David Miller has signed on for the LA Knight Riders for the upcoming season for Major League Cricket. This is second season of the Major League Cricket after their rip roaring success in the first season.

The announcement came just before the start of the T20 World Cup 2024 which is set to begin in a few days. The United States of America is set to co-host the event along with West Indies and this is the first time the Americans are set to host an event of this nature.

MI New York won the first title by beating Seattle Orcas in the finals by 7 wickets. The second season of Major League Cricket is set to begin on the 5th of July with the finals of the event set to be played on the 28th of July.

David Miller signs for LA Knight Riders

South African star David Miller who is a well known T20 star is set to play for the Los Angeles based LA Knight Riders for the second season of Major League Cricket. The team is being led by Sunil Narine and didn’t have a great season last year. The Knight Riders finished last in the table with 2 points from five matches.

This year the very first game for the Knight Riders is against the Texas Super Kings. The addition of David Miller will give the LAKR side a huge boost as the left-handed batter is a huge name in this format of the game.

David Miller didn’t have a great season in the IPL with just over 200 runs from 9 matches. The veteran batter will be expected to play a key role for his side during the T20 World Cup and possibly help South Africa win their first ICC title.

The other notable players in the LA Knight Riders team are Bangladeshi legend Shakib AL Hasan, Jason Roy, Ali Khan, Spencer Johnson, Adam Zampa, and Andre Russell. The Knight Riders will want to ride on the wave of their success as they have recently won the Indian Premier League 2024 title by beating Sunrisers Hyderabad in the finals.
summary:
* The second season of the Major League Cricket (MLC) is set to begin on July 5th, with the finals scheduled for July 28th.
* David Miller, a South African star batter, has signed with the LA Knight Riders for the upcoming season.
* The LA Knight Riders, led by Sunil Narine, finished last in the table with 2 points from five matches in the previous season.
* The team's first game of the season is against the Texas Super Kings.
* Notable players in the LA Knight Riders team include Shakib Al Hasan, Jason Roy, Ali Khan, Spencer Johnson, Adam Zampa, and Andre Russell.
* This is the second season of the MLC, following a successful first season where MI New York won the title by beating Seattle Orcas in the finals by 7 wickets.

title: Monumental Sports Network and Willow by Cricbuzz Partner to Air Washington Freedom’s Major League Cricket Matches
body:
Washington Freedom’s Major League Cricket Matches to be Broadcast Live on Monumental Sports Network Starting July 6

Washington, D.C. – June 26, 2024 – Willow by Cricbuzz, offering more live, streaming and on-demand cricket than any other sports service, and Monumental Sports Network (MNMT) today announced a groundbreaking partnership to broadcast Washington Freedom matches this upcoming Major League Cricket (MLC) season. The first match available to fans on Monumental Sports Network will be the Freedom’s season opener vs. MI New York on July 6, 2024, at 3:00 PM ET. The Freedom are the first professional cricket team to represent Washington, D.C. and began play in 2023.

The network’s slate will feature seven matches from July 6 to July 22. Monumental Sports Network is the exclusive local television media rights holder for the NHL’s Washington Capitals, the NBA’s Washington Wizards, and the WNBA’s Washington Mystics. It also boasts a comprehensive schedule of original programming and live men’s and women’s college basketball, college football, college volleyball, high school basketball, and esports, as well as Washington Spirit (NWSL), Old Glory DC (Major League Rugby), Hershey Bears (AHL), and Annapolis Blues (NPSL) games.

“Washington Freedom matches are an electric addition to our summer programming lineup and further our commitment to all sports fans throughout the DMV,” said Caitlin Mangum, Vice President, Content & Programming at Monumental Sports Network. “Cricket is undergoing a surge of popularity in the U.S. and we’re excited for a new audience to get exposure to the plethora of live, local sports programming on our air.”

“The unexpected success of the US national cricket team in the T20 World Cup has vividly shown us the untapped potential of cricket in America,” said Todd Myers, COO of Willow by Cricbuzz. “We are now at a pivotal turning point where we can leverage the country’s excitement and passion for the sport to build a broader, more engaged fan base nationwide. Our partnership with Monumental Sports Network is key in this transformative era, bringing premier cricket directly to American viewers and giving them a hometown team, the Washington Freedom, to cheer for.”

Fans within the network’s footprint can watch Washington Freedom matches live on Monumental Sports Network, which is available on both linear TV and streaming platforms. Viewers from Delaware to Richmond, VA can access these matches through their Pay TV subscription, directly on monumentalsportsnetwork.com, or by using the Monumental Sports Network streaming app, compatible with iOS, Android, Apple TV, Roku, and Amazon Fire TV devices. For those without a Pay TV subscription, Monumental Sports Network offers direct-to-consumer subscription memberships, which can be purchased monthly or annually either on their website or via the Monumental Sports Network app.

Willow by Cricbuzz will also distribute all MLC matches this season on TV and its dedicated streaming app. To learn more, please visit www.willow.tv.

2024 Washington Freedom Matches on Monumental Sports Network:

Saturday, July 6 vs. MI New York at 3:00 PM ET

Monday, July 8 vs. Texas Super Kings at 3:00 PM ET

Thursday, July 11 at Seattle Orcas at 8:30 PM ET

Sunday, July 14 vs. LA Knight Riders at 3:30 PM ET

Tuesday, July 16 at MI New York at 8:30 PM ET

Friday, July 19 vs. Texas Super Kings at 8:30 PM ET

Monday, July 22 vs. San Francisco Unicorns at 8:30 PM ET

About Willow by Cricbuzz

Willow by Cricbuzz is the premier destination for cricket in the United States and Canada, boasting the most comprehensive live, streaming, and on-demand cricket coverage available. Guided by its mission to make cricket globally accessible, Willow by Cricbuzz combines cricket’s rich heritage with innovative broadcasting to offer an unmatched viewing experience.

Dedicated to excellence and innovation, Willow by Cricbuzz provides cricket enthusiasts with HD-quality live streaming, interactive scorecards, and extensive coverage from nearly every major cricket board and tournament worldwide.

Willow by Cricbuzz’s TV network is also available through top providers such as DISH, Sling, Fios, Spectrum, Xfinity, and Optimum, and also offers a dedicated streaming app available on all major CTV devices, including Apple TV, Roku, Samsung Smart TVs, Amazon Fire TV, Xbox One, Android TV, Chromecast, Google TV, and more, ensuring fans never miss a moment of the action.

Explore the ultimate cricket experience at www.willow.tv.

About Cricbuzz

Cricbuzz is the global leader in cricket content, accessible across the web, iOS, and Android platforms on mobile and connected TV. Offering 360-degree comprehensive cricket coverage, Cricbuzz delivers ball-by-ball text commentary, compelling video analysis by the best cricket experts worldwide, timely news, match reports, editorials, statistics, rankings, and live match streaming in several regions. With over 125 million monthly active users globally and more than 495 million downloads as of January 2024, Cricbuzz is the largest single sport app in the world.

About Monumental Sports Network

Monumental Sports Network is wholly owned and operated by Monumental Sports & Entertainment (MSE). The network holds exclusive local television media rights for the NHL’s Washington Capitals, NBA’s Washington Wizards and WNBA’s Washington Mystics games. Monumental Sports Network is also the TV and digital home to the NBA G League’s Capital City Go-Go and the NBA 2K League’s Wizards District Gaming as well as exclusive behind-the-scenes content and original sports and entertainment programming. The network also boasts the most comprehensive regional high-school and regional collegiate Division II-and-under sports programming in the greater Washington D.C. metro area. For more, visit: www.monumentalsportsnetwork.com.

###
summary:
* The Washington Freedom, a professional cricket team representing Washington, D.C., will have their matches broadcast live on Monumental Sports Network starting July 6, 2024.
* The partnership between Willow by Cricbuzz and Monumental Sports Network will feature seven matches from July 6 to July 22.
* The first match to be broadcast will be the Freedom's season opener against MI New York on July 6 at 3:00 PM ET.
* Fans within the network's footprint can watch the matches live on Monumental Sports Network, which is available on linear TV, streaming platforms, and mobile apps.
* The broadcast schedule includes seven matches, with games against MI New York, Texas Super Kings, Seattle Orcas, LA Knight Riders, and San Francisco Unicorns.
* Willow by Cricbuzz will also distribute all MLC matches this season on TV and its dedicated streaming app.

title: The Hundred: Jason Roy replaces Brydon Carse at Northern Superchargers
body:
Roy replaces Carse at Superchargers

Published

26 June 2024

Former England opener Jason Roy has signed for Hundred side Northern Superchargers as a replacement for banned seamer Brydon Carse.

Roy, 33, was unselected in the draft in March after spending three seasons with Oval Invincibles.

He could miss the beginning of this year's campaign, which begins on 23 July, due to his commitments with LA Knight Riders in Major League Cricket in the USA.

Carse, 28, is serving a three-month ban for historical breaches of betting rules and will miss the entire Hundred competition.

Superchargers will be led for the first time be former England all-rounder Andrew Flintoff, who has been appointed head coach following the departure of James Foster.

Related Topics
summary: * Jason Roy, a former England opener, may miss the start of the Hundred campaign due to his commitments with LA Knight Riders in the Major League Cricket tournament in the USA.

title: Jason Roy replaces Brydon Carse at Northern Superchargers in the Hundred as Flintoff Bolsters Squad
body:
Jason Roy joins Northern Superchargers as a replacement player for the Hundred team, replacing Brydon Carse who was ruled out due to suspension, with Roy being unsold at the initial draft.

By the Numbers

Roy entered the draft with a £100,000 reserve price.

Roy averaged 17.11 in the title-winning 2023 season for the Oval Invincibles.

Yes, But

Jason Roy may miss the Superchargers' opening match in the Hundred due to his commitments in Major League Cricket with the Los Angeles Knight Riders.

State of Play

Andrew Flintoff will be coaching the Superchargers for the men's Hundred, taking over from James Foster.

Roy withdrew from the IPL to prioritize family time and has been dealing with a calf injury that caused him to miss Surrey's recent T20 Blast games.

What's Next

Mark Wood is yet to sign a replacement deal for a Hundred team, likely waiting for clarity on his availability during England's Test matches.

Bottom Line

Jason Roy's addition to the Northern Superchargers brings hope for a resurgence in his form, with Andrew Flintoff's mentorship potentially aiding his performance in the Hundred.
summary:
* Jason Roy has commitments in Major League Cricket with the Los Angeles Knight Riders, which may cause him to miss the Superchargers' opening match in the Hundred.

title: Monumental Sports Network to Air 7 Major League Cricket Matches This Summer; Will Other RSNs Add Cricket?
body:
Apparently, the United States national cricket team’s victory against Pakistan in the 2024 T20 World Cup earlier this month has created higher enthusiasm for the sport domestically. That’s the gamble Monumental Sports Network is taking, at any rate. The regional sports network (RSN) which serves fans in Washington, D.C., the DMV and parts of Pennsylvania has announced a new partnership with Willow by Cricbuzz to distribute a package of Major League Cricket matches featuring the Washington Freedom, beginning with a match on Saturday, July 6.

Monumental Sports is available on DIRECTV STREAM, Hulu Live TV, and YouTube TV.

Key Details:

Monumental Sports Network’s coverage of Washington Freedom cricket will continue through July.

Viewers can watch Monumental as part of a pay-TV subscription, or in-market with the Monumental Sports Network App.

Major League Cricket matches are normally broadcast on Willow TV in the United States.

Monumental is partnering with Willow to offer seven Washington Freedom cricket matches, beginning on July 6 and continuing through July 22. The matches will join WNBA basketball contests from the Washington Mystics, though they won’t be available on Monumental long enough to air alongside NBA games from the Washington Wizards or NHL matchups featuring the Washington Capitals on the channel.

Check out Monumental’s schedule of Washington Freedom matches:

Date Time (ET) Opponent Saturday, July 6 3 p.m. MI New York Monday, July 8 3 p.m. Texas Super Kings Thursday, July 11 8:30 p.m. Seattle Orcas Sunday, July 14 3:30 p.m. LA Knight Riders Tuesday, July 16 8:30 p.m. MI New York Friday, July 19 8:30 p.m. Texas Super Kings Monday, July 22 8:30 p.m. San Francisco Unicorns

The presentations are being made in partnership with Willow, which carries all MLC matches on the Willow TV channel and Willow on-demand streaming platform. Chief operating officer of Willow Todd Myers specifically cited the U.S. national team’s victory at the T20 World Cup as an inciting factor for the partnership with Monumental.

“The unexpected success of the US national cricket team in the T20 World Cup has vividly shown us the untapped potential of cricket in America,” Myers said. “We are now at a pivotal turning point where we can leverage the country’s excitement and passion for the sport to build a broader, more engaged fan base nationwide. Our partnership with Monumental Sports Network is key in this transformative era, bringing premier cricket directly to American viewers and giving them a hometown team, the Washington Freedom, to cheer for.”

“Washington Freedom matches are an electric addition to our summer programming lineup and further our commitment to all sports fans throughout the DMV,” added Caitlin Mangum, VP, Content & Programming at Monumental Sports Network. “Cricket is undergoing a surge of popularity in the U.S. and we’re excited for a new audience to get exposure to the plethora of live, local sports programming on our air.”

Will Other RSNs Try to Add Live Cricket Rights?

The addition of live cricket matches based off what’s likely a temporary ratings boost for the sport thanks to a single World Cup victory from Team USA may seem like a bit of an overreaction to some. But with the cost of marquee sports rights climbing inexorably, providers are looking for any way to bring new content to their airwaves without paying extreme amounts to get it.

That could lead more RSNs to add small cricket packages of their own in the near future. Major League Cricket only has six teams at the moment, but some are stationed in cities like Los Angeles and New York where viewers have access to SportsNet-branded RSNs. I don’t think any cricket teams playing in areas where a Bally Sports channel is the dominant RSN will see a new deal with Willow to distribute games in the near future; Diamond Sports Group, which owns the Bally Sports channels, has enough problems with the partner leagues it currently has at the moment.
summary:
* Monumental Sports Network has partnered with Willow by Cricbuzz to broadcast a package of Major League Cricket matches featuring the Washington Freedom, starting from July 6.
* The partnership will feature seven Washington Freedom cricket matches, which will be broadcasted on Monumental Sports Network through July 22.
* The matches will be available to viewers with a pay-TV subscription or through the Monumental Sports Network App for in-market viewers.
* The schedule of Washington Freedom matches includes games against MI New York, Texas Super Kings, Seattle Orcas, LA Knight Riders, and San Francisco Unicorns.
* The partnership is a result of the growing popularity of cricket in the US, following the national team's victory in the 2024 T20 World Cup.
* The Chief Operating Officer of Willow, Todd Myers, believes that the partnership will help build a broader and more engaged fan base for cricket in the US.
* Monumental Sports Network is available on DIRECTV STREAM, Hulu Live TV, and YouTube TV.

title: San Francisco Unicorns release 2024 uniforms and merchandise with Belgravia Apparel
body:
For the second consecutive season, The Bay Area’s Major League Cricket team will wear uniforms produced by elite Australian custom teamwear apparel brand Belgravia

The Belgravia San Francisco Unicorns online team store for uniforms and apparel will be available from Monday June 24

The sophomore season of Major League Cricket (MLC) will begin on July 5, with the first of the Unicorns’ seven regular-season matches taking place on July 7. Tickets for all matches are available now at tickets.majorleaguecricket.com

SAN FRANCISCO, Ca. (Jun 22, 2024) — The San Francisco Unicorns will wear uniforms produced by Australian custom teamwear brand Belgravia Apparel in the sophomore season of Major League Cricket, which begins on July 5.

The Australian custom teamwear apparel brand – who provided the San Francisco Unicorns’ first-ever uniforms for the inaugural 2023 MLC season – will officially release the 2024 uniforms and make them available for purchase on Monday June 24. The official store will also feature a range of merchandise that includes jerseys, t-shirts, polo shirts, shorts and caps.

“After a hugely successful partnership with the San Francisco Unicorns last season, we’re absolutely delighted to team up with the Bay Area’s team once again,” said Joe Siciliano, Belgravia’s General Manager of National Elite Sports. “As an established brand that creates uniforms and apparel for professional sports teams in Australia and New Zealand, we’re excited to continue expanding the footprint of our world-class operations in the United States.”

Belgravia Apparel produces uniforms for professional and elite teams in cricket, soccer, rugby, Australian rules football, basketball, hockey, and many more.

“With a rich heritage and history in the sport, Belgravia Apparel were an ideal partner in our inaugural season, so naturally we’re thrilled to wear their iconic designs in 2024,” said San Francisco Unicorns General Manager David White. “Belgravia’s entrepreneurial spirit and mission to grow the sport of cricket aligns with our objectives, and we’re really pleased to give fans in the Bay Area the chance to wear our colors and support our team.”

The 2024 Major League Cricket season will commence on July 5, with San Francisco Unicorn’s first match coming on July 7, when they take on the LA Knight Riders at Grand Prairie Stadium, in Grand Prairie, TX.

The Unicorns’ 2024 roster features Australia captain Pat Cummins, explosive batters Finn Allen and Matthew Short, express bowler Haris Rauf, and future superstar Jake Fraser-McGurk. For the second successive season, the Unicorns will be coached by two-time Indian Premier League (IPL) Player of the Season Shane Watson.

title: Lexus Goes to Bat for Cognizant Major League Cricket League
body:
By Allison Watkinson

TLL Reporter

Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) has secured a licensing sponsorship partnership with the Lexus automotive brand for the league’s upcoming second season.

MLC is the first professional Twenty20 cricket championship to operate in the US. Exclusively sanctioned by USA Cricket, MLC showcases players from around the globe.

MLC’s first cricket season took place in 2023 and featured matches with the Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings and the Washington Freedom.

“We are excited to welcome Lexus as the automotive partner of Major League Cricket,” said Major League Cricket CEO, Vijay Srinivasan. “Their reputation for unparalleled luxury and commitment to their customers aligns perfectly with our vision for the league. Together, we look forward to delivering an exceptional experience to cricket fans across the nation.”

Under the new agreement, the Lexus brand will be integrated into both on-field and broadcasted content throughout the MLC season. The brand will also be prominently featured across MLC’s digital platforms and fan communications.

“Partnering with Major League Cricket offers Lexus the opportunity to reach a new diverse fanbase with a brand that shares an unwavering commitment to performance, customer experience, and their fans,” said Lexus advertising head, David Telfer. “We’re committed to growing with MLC during its second season to elevate the presence of the U.S. team and engage with new fans.”

MLC kicks off its second season on July 5, 2024. Tickets for all matches, including the four playoffs, are available online through the Official Cognizant Major League Cricket website.

The MLC season will extend beyond the pitch with a range of entertainment, events and giveaways that will take place throughout the tournament. The events and entertainment will include fireworks shows, player meet-and-greets, autograph signings, merchandise giveaways and more.

Initially launched in 1989, Lexus is a luxury automotive brand that distributes its vehicles in more than 90 countries acrosss the globe. In the US, Lexus offers a full range of luxury vehicles that are sold through a nationwide network of 244 automotive dealerships.
summary:
* Major League Cricket (MLC) has secured a licensing sponsorship partnership with the Lexus automotive brand for the league's upcoming second season.
* The partnership will integrate the Lexus brand into on-field and broadcast content throughout the MLC season
* The brand will be featured prominently across MLC's digital platforms and fan communications

title: Cheer for the Seattle Orcas by grabbing your tickets for MLC Season 2
body:
The Seattle Orcas will kick off their 2024 Cognizant Major League Cricket season against MI New York on Friday, July 5th in what will be a rematch of last year’s final. The highly anticipated match is set to take place at Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

“Last year’s final was an unforgettable experience,” said All-rounder Harmeet Singh, who played in the 2023 final. “We’re excited to start against New York this time around and look forward to getting our season started on the right foot.”

This year’s season opener promises an electric atmosphere, especially with players returning from a successful World Cup. Seattle Orcas’ Harmeet Singh and Aaron Jones were part of the USA’s record-breaking run to the Super-8 stage and have experienced the fans' energy firsthand.

“It’s a great opportunity for fans to show their appreciation for the players who made such an impact this summer, for both the USA and all the sides at the World Cup,” said a coach or somebody who is not Harmeet or Aaron from the Seattle Orcas preseason camp(LINK). “Of course we’re looking to start the season with a positive result too, and the entire squad is focused on preparations for this season’s opener.

After North Carolina, the action shifts to Grand Prairie in Dallas - the site of USA’s famous win against Pakistan from this summer.

“We’ll be chomping at the bit to play in Dallas,” said Aaron Jones. “Obviously we have great memories there from this Summer with the USA and we’re looking forward to playing in front of another packed house.”

Tickets for all the matches for Season 2 are now on sale, starting at $30 for both venues. Apart from individual match tickets, an All Regular Season Matches pass is also available for both Grand Prairie and Morrisville, starting at $288 and $216 respectively.

Seattle Orcas 2024 MLC Schedule (All Times PST):

MI New York vs Seattle Orcas - July 5 | Friday | 12:30 PM | Morrisville

LA Knight Riders vs Seattle Orcas - July 9 | Tuesday | 4:30 PM | Dallas

Seattle Orcas vs Washington Freedom - July 11 | Thursday | 4:30 PM | Dallas

Seattle Orcas vs San Francisco Unicorns - July 15 | Monday | 12:30 PM | Morrisville

Seattle Orcas vs LA Knight Riders - July 17 | Wednesday | 12:00 PM | Morrisville

San Francisco Unicorns vs Seattle Orcas - July 20 | Saturday | 4:30 PM | Dallas

Texas Super Kings vs Seattle Orcas - July 23 | Tuesday | 4:30 PM | Dallas

An exclusive offer for a limited time period is also available till June 30th, for Picnic Row seating. You can avail a discount of 15% by using the codeword PICNICINPARK (case sensitive). Picnic Row seating will offer you some amazing perks like open air seating, all-inclusive food and drinks, and an air-conditioned sports bar with a VIP view.

title: Lexus becomes Automotive Partner of Cognizant Major League Cricket
body:
Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) is thrilled to announce that luxury automotive brand Lexus has become the Automotive Partner for the league's highly anticipated second season.

Vijay Srinivasan, CEO, Cognizant Major League Cricket said, "We are excited to welcome Lexus as the Automotive Partner of Major League Cricket. Their reputation for unparalleled luxury and commitment to their customers aligns perfectly with our vision for the league. Together, we look forward to delivering an exceptional experience to cricket fans across the nation."

Under the new agreement, Lexus will be integrated into on-field and broadcast content throughout the season. The brand will also be featured in fan communications and MLC digital platforms. This is the first time Lexus and MLC have partnered together.

David Telfer, Head of Lexus Advertising & Media said, “Partnering with Major League Cricket offers Lexus the opportunity to reach a new diverse fanbase with a brand that shares an unwavering commitment to performance, customer experience, and their fans. We’re committed to growing with MLC during its second season to elevate the presence of the U.S. team and engage with new fans.”

MLC kicks off its second season on Friday, July 5. The season's excitement extends beyond the pitch, with entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, player signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the tournament.
summary:
**Partnership Announcement**: Luxury automotive brand Lexus has become the Automotive Partner for the MLC's second season.

**Season Details**: The second season of MLC is set to kick off on Friday, July 5.

**Season Activities**: The tournament will feature entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, player signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the season.

**Partnership Benefits**: As part of the partnership, Lexus will be integrated into on-field and broadcast content, fan communications, and MLC digital platforms. This is the first partnership between Lexus and MLC.

title: How Silicon Valley lured ‘tech-savvy’ Cummins to US league
body:
Pat Cummins became Cricket Australia’s first $3 million player last year, and earned another $3.67 million at this year’s IPL, but money had nothing to do with him joining the San Francisco Unicorns in America’s fledgling Major League Cricket competition.

Australia’s Test and one-day captain was planning some time at home but has instead jumped at the opportunity to build relationships with some of America’s most successful entrepreneurs in nearby Silicon Valley.

The most an MCL player can earn is about $300,000 for seven regular games and, potentially, two finals. Cummins earned more than $216,000 a match in the IPL.

The lead investors in the San Francisco team, Anand Rajaraman and Venky Harinarayan, friends from Chennai who completed computer science PhDs at Stanford University and have become successful entrepreneurs, initiated the chase for Cummins.

“Of course we’re huge fans of Pat Cummins and really wanted him to join the team,” Rajaraman told this masthead. “But what really helps us out is how sort of tech-savvy and forward-thinking Pat Cummins is.

“He was thinking of his career beyond cricket, and he’s thinking about how to do interesting things at the intersection of technology and cricket, even after his playing days are done.

“He felt it would be valuable for him to develop deep relationships with Silicon Valley. We are, fortunately, in Silicon Valley, and we can help connect that.

“All the top companies and the top venture capitals are here, and we can help him network and build the kind of knowledge that he wants about start-ups and venture capital and so on. That’s why it kind of worked out.”

Cummins’ manager, Neil Maxwell, said the player was excited about the opportunities.

“He’s a very curious bloke, and he likes to learn,” Maxwell said. “He finds that learning about these things is really interesting.

“There’s a range of people connected to this franchise, including the CEO of YouTube, CEO of Adobe. It just opens up Silicon Valley.”

Cummins, who is in the West Indies preparing for Australia’s Twenty20 World Cup match against Bangladesh on Friday morning (AEST), may be the world’s only premier fast bowler with a degree in business management.

It was a strange signing because the Unicorns are supported by Cricket Victoria, while his home state of NSW supports the Washington Freedom. The four other teams in the MLC are run by IPL franchises.

Loading

Rajaraman and Harinarayan approached Cricket Victoria chief Nick Cummins about signing the elite paceman.

Nick Cummins once worked with Pat Cummins as general manager of the Sydney Thunder, and knew it would take more than another T20 competition to clinch the deal.

“Pat was pretty clear: ‘I’m not looking for more opportunities to play cricket,’” Nick Cummins told this masthead.

“My conversation with him and Neil was more around, ‘This is so much more than cricket, thinking about your aspirations and what you want to do beyond cricket.’

“It’s a chance to connect with the tech community in Silicon Valley, connect with the greenest state in America around what he’s doing for Cricket for Climate [an environmental organisation], and I think that’s what really excited him about it.”

Sports news, results and expert commentary. Sign up for our Sport newsletter.
summary:
* Australian cricket captain Pat Cummins has joined the San Francisco Unicorns in the MLC tournament, despite earning significantly less than his IPL salary.
* Cummins was attracted to the opportunity to build relationships with successful entrepreneurs in Silicon Valley and to explore the intersection of technology and cricket.
* The lead investors of the San Francisco team, Anand Rajaraman and Venky Harinarayan, initiated the chase for Cummins and were drawn to his tech-savvy and forward-thinking approach.
* Cummins will earn around $300,000 for seven regular games and potentially two finals, a significant drop from his IPL salary.
* The MLC team is supported by Cricket Victoria, despite Cummins being from NSW, which supports the Washington Freedom team.
* The signing was facilitated by Cricket Victoria chief Nick Cummins, who knew Cummins from his time as general manager of the Sydney Thunder.

title: How Pat Cummins’ love for technology lured him to Major League Cricket
body:
Star Australia skipper Pat Cummins is all set to make his way to the USA for the upcoming season of the MLC (Major League Cricket). It is interesting to note that an average player in the tournament can earn up to INR 2.5 crore for seven matches and two finals, whereas Cummins earned approximately INR 1.8 crore per match in the recent season of the IPL (Indian Premier League) 2024.

For the upcoming season of the MLC, Cummins has been roped in by San Francisco Unicorns, and the lead investors in the team, Anand Rajaraman and Venky Harinarayan, came forward and revealed themselves as huge fans of the Australian skipper.

“Of course we’re huge fans of Pat Cummins and really wanted him to join the team, but what really helps us out is how sort of tech-savvy and forward-thinking Pat Cummins is. He was thinking of his career beyond cricket, and he’s thinking about how to do interesting things at the intersection of technology and cricket, even after his playing days are done,” Rajaraman told the Sydney Morning Herald.

Cummins’ signing with Unicorns was made a reality thanks to the ace pacer’s shared interest in technology. The CEO of YouTube and Adobe are both connected with San Francisco, and according to Cummins’ manager, it was a chance to learn something new for the World Cup winner.

“He’s a very curious bloke, and he likes to learn, He finds that learning about these things is really interesting. There’s a range of people connected to this franchise, including the CEO of YouTube and the CEO of Adobe. It just opens up Silicon Valley,” Cummins’ manager Neil Maxwell said.

It is worth noting that Unicorns are supported by Cricket Victoria, while Cummins’ home state of NSW supports Washington Freedom. Rajaraman and Harinarayan approached Cricket Victoria’s chief Nick Cummins regarding the signing, and Nick made it clear that Cummins does not want more opportunities to play cricket, but the signing was only possible as coming to San Francisco Unicorns opens the avenue of Silicon Valley for Pat.
summary:
* Australian cricket team skipper Pat Cummins is set to play in the upcoming season of the MLC in the USA.
* Cummins has been signed by the San Francisco Unicorns team, led by investors Anand Rajaraman and Venky Harinarayan, who are fans of the Australian skipper.
* The signing was made possible due to Cummins' interest in technology and the opportunity to learn from the team's connections in Silicon Valley, including the CEOs of YouTube and Adobe.
* The average player in the MLC can earn up to INR 2.5 crore for seven matches and two finals, which is a significant amount compared to Cummins' earnings in the recent IPL season.
* Cricket Victoria supports the San Francisco Unicorns, while Cummins' home state of NSW supports the Washington Freedom team in the MLC.

title: Cognizant: Latest News, Videos and Photos of Cognizant
body:
Major League Cricket congratulates USA on historic T20 World Cup campaign

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jun 18, 2024, 16:12 (IST)

The USA Cricket team's successful run in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 has garnered support from Americans. Major League Cricket praised the national squad for advancing to the Super 8 stage.

Why IT majors like cognizant, Infosys, HCLTech are acquiring engineering services companies

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jun 12, 2024, 14:13 (IST)

IT companies like cognizant and Infosys are acquiring engineering services firms to diversify revenue streams and stay ahead of competition. cognizant's recent $1.3 billion acquisition of Belcan marks a significant move in this direction.

Why are Wipro and cognizant struggling to turn their fortunes around?

THE ECONOMIC TIMES / May 28, 2024, 14:14 (IST)

During the early days of the IT industry, growth simply required a company to win new clients at regular intervals. But with the industry maturing, the stakes are much higher, and IT services firms are struggling to come up with a playbook to deal with challenges

Major League Cricket granted List-A status by ICC ahead of second season

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 28, 2024, 10:59 (IST)

The International Cricket Council has granted List-A status to Major League Cricket (MLC), marking its second season starting on July 5, 2024. This recognition solidifies MLC's position as America's premier domestic T20 tournament, ensures official career statistics, and boosts domestic cricket talent development by recognizing local players and emerging stars.

Court takes cognizance of ED chargesheet against builder Tekchandani

TNN / May 31, 2024, 22:43 (IST)

The special court took cognizance of the chargesheet filed by the Enforcement Directorate against builder Lalit Tekchandani and 15 others individual and entities. The ED initiated a money laundering investigation based on FIRs against Tekchandani and others related to Supreme Construction & Developer Pvt Ltd.

Nomura buys 2.7% in cognizant, sparks speculation about return of activist investor

TNN / May 17, 2024, 00:43 (IST)

cognizant's stock surged on Nasdaq as speculation of an activist investor's return grows. Nomura Holdings acquired a significant stake, becoming a major shareholder. The board's resistance to granting special meeting authority reflects a defensive stance against short-term activism.

TCS, cognizant, and other IT companies implement new strategies to encourage office attendance

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 16, 2024, 16:06 (IST)

cognizant, TCS, Dell Technologies, Wipro, and Infosys are implementing innovative strategies to incentivize employees to return to the office post-pandemic, including roster management apps, variable pay linked to office attendance, attendance monitoring systems, and flexible work-from-home options.

Wipro to settle suit with top execs who joined rival co

TNN / May 13, 2024, 03:13 (IST)

Wipro is finalizing a settlement agreement with its former CFO Jatin Dalal and former healthcare head Mohd Haque, involving a lawsuit seeking Rs 25 crore from Dalal for breach of contract and a complaint against Haque for breaching non-compete agreements by joining cognizant.

IT majors cognizant, Capgemini hired 1.5 lakh less employees in 2023; here's why

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 06, 2024, 12:08 (IST)

The total number of employees hired by major IT companies cognizant and Capgemini decreased globally by 151,607 in 2023 compared to 2022, according to their regulatory filings.

What TCS, Wipro, cognizant, Dell and Infosys are doing to make employees return to the office

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / May 25, 2024, 12:00 (IST)

Tech companies are transitioning from remote work to office presence, enforcing compliance measures. cognizant and TCS link pay to office attendance. Dell uses color-coded badges, while Wipro focuses on engagement. Infosys offers work-from-home options for select departments.

cognizant to use Google Gemini for software development, internal operations

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Mar 21, 2024, 20:59 (IST)

cognizant and Google Cloud collaborate to enhance software development using AI. Ravi Kumar S invests $1 billion in generative AI. cognizant to train 70,000 employees on Gemini. Thomas Kurian highlights AI benefits. Google Cloud will support cognizant in the development of AI-led software engineering best practices, and by helping the cognizant Google Cloud AI University launch advanced courses on AI use cases.
summary:
* Major League Cricket (MLC) has been granted List-A status by the International Cricket Council (ICC) ahead of its second season, which starts on July 5, 2024.
* This recognition solidifies MLC's position as America's premier domestic T20 tournament and ensures official career statistics for players.
* The List-A status boosting domestic cricket talent development by recognizing local players and emerging stars.

Additionally, the article also mentions that Major League Cricket congratulated the USA Cricket team on their historic T20 World Cup campaign, where they advanced to the Super 8 stage.

title: 25 domestic season: 85+ teams gather for captains, managers meeting at Sulaibiya cricket ground
body:
A full house for KCC Domestic Season 2024-25 captains and managers meeting held at Sulaibiya Cricket Ground as more than 85 teams registered with KCC

Key Highlights:

The meeting was Presided by KCC Director General (DG) Mr. Sajid Ashraf and the chief guests were Mr. Bijesh Todi & Mr. Vineet Agarwal from New Delhi, India – Co-Founders of T10 Sports & Clothing Partners of Kings XI Punjab – IPL, Seattle Orcas – Major League Cricket, USA – Saint Lucia Kings – Caribbean Premier League & USA Cricket Team).

DG Mr. Sajid Ashraf announced the much awaited official handover of the entire Sulaibiya Garden to KCC Board President Mr. Haider Farman by the relevant government authorities where the 2nd ICC approved facility will now be built (2024-25) for the hosting of international tournaments along with the state of the art high performance cricket academy in the State of Kuwait

T10 Sports announced as the only ICC & KCC approved clothing partner for broadcasted Sulaibiya Turf Tournaments in association with Dream 11 & Fancode for all KCC registered teams

More than 40 teams registered with T-10 Sports and given special discounted prices (9.5KD for a complete set of playing lower, jersey and cap of premium quality) along with Kings XI Punjab Jersey (memorabilia) signed by Shikhar Dhawan, Arshdeep Singh, Kagiso Rabada and Liam Livingstone

T10 sports announced it’s membership program with KCC where KCC registered teams and players stand a chance to win tickets to prestigious leagues like IPL, Indian Premier League, MLC (Major League Cricket, USA) and CPL, Caribbean Premier League through various membership programs.

All the 120+ representatives of KCC domestic teams who attended the meeting were given the Kuwait National Team Jersey by T-10 Sports as KCC initiates a fan engagement program like never before for it’s national men’s and women’s team

The much needed and privileged concept of teams membership and players membership program with KCC was announced by Mr. Ashraf. Only the approved teams (based on owners and sposnors background checks with all the required legal documents) along with approved players (based on employer and complete residency details and all the other required legal documents) will be allowed to participate in KCC tournaments and enter KCC premises with unique identity cards & membership number as the ICC Globle Code of Anti Corruption is implemented to counter spot fixing and potential match fixing threats in KCC domestic tournaments

A comprehensive list of domestic tournaments, membership process, registration processes, and timelines for the 2024-2025 season (August-June) was presented starting with KCC T-10 Summer League in August, powered by Al Muzaini Exchange, in the presence of Mr. Guru (Operations Manager at Al Muzaini Exchange) and Mr. Trevin (Digital Marketing Officer at Al Muzaini Exchange).

3rd umpire facility to be further enhanced in the new season with an introduction of no-ball referrals upon dismissals as and when required by match officials.

All the Senior KCC members looking after national teams, coaching, administration, operations, domestic, marketing, technical, public relations, logistics and venue management were also present in the grand domestic season meeting 2024-25 comprising of Mr. Qasim Ali (National Head Coach & Development Manager) Mr. Melwyn Serrao (Head of Domestic & Member,HPC), Mr. Naveen Jayan (Head of Match Officials & Member,HPC), Mr. Naresh Dsouza (Deputy Head of Match Officials & Technical) Mr. Robert Dsouza ( Head of Operations), Mr. Saud Qamar (Head of PR & Member, HPC) , Mr. Rishi Jayan , (Head of Marketing), Mr. Tahir Khan (Head Coach Juniors & Venue Management), Mr. Ali Talib (National Juniors Team Manager & Member,HPC), Mr. Nasser Imbran (Logistics Manager) and Mr. Harman Sahni (KCC Anchor & Commentator) along with all the KCC Match officials (umpires & scorers).

We wish all the teams and players best of luck for the upcoming season.

A follow up meeting will be lined up very soon where top 40 teams and their players will be made official members of Kuwait Cricket Club on first come first serve basis criteria and these 40 teams will play throughout the year in KCC Sulaibiya Turf Tournaments which will be Broadcasted live on Dream 11 & Fancode with a 6 camera setup including a full fledged 3rd umpire facility

ICC – International Cricket Council Asian Cricket Council Almuzaini Exchange Co Alhafiz Co T10Sports MEC Study Group Pro Sports Kuwait CricksLab Kuwait Swedish
summary: There is no direct mention of the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament in the article. However, it is mentioned that T10 Sports, a clothing partner of Seattle Orcas, a team in the Major League Cricket (MLC) in the USA, is also a partner of the Kuwait Cricket Club (KCC). Additionally, T10 Sports announced a membership program with KCC where KCC registered teams and players stand a chance to win tickets to prestigious leagues like IPL, MLC, and CPL through various membership programs.

title: Willow by Cricbuzz and the YES Network partner for major league cricket
body:
Willow by Cricbuzz, offering more live, streaming and on-demand cricket than any other sports service, and the YES Network, the nation’s pre-eminent regional sports network, announced a new deal to air seven matches featuring the defending MLC champion MI New York this upcoming Major League Cricket (MLC) season. These matches will be available on both the YES television network and the YES App, as well on Willow by Cricbuzz’s TV network and its streaming platform.

This partnership will bring the exhilarating MLC action to YES’ coverage territory of New York State, Connecticut, northeastern Pennsylvania and north and central New Jersey, starting with the Friday, July 5 season-opener pitting MI New York against the 2023 runners-up Seattle Orcas (3:30 p.m. ET).

As MI New York, led by elite West Indian batter Kieron Pollard, gears up to defend their inaugural title, YES viewers can look forward to the thrill of seven high-octane matches. These electrifying encounters will air live on YES’ television network and on the YES App, which can be accessed at www.watchyesnetwork.com. YES owns the exclusive regional media rights of the 27-time World Champion New York Yankees and the Brooklyn Nets.

YES’ MI New York Schedule

Friday, July 5 MI New York vs. Seattle Orcas 3:30 p.m. ET*

Saturday, July 6 MI New York vs. Washington Freedom 3 p.m. ET*

Friday, July 12 MI New York vs. Texas Super Kings 3 p.m. ET*

Sunday, July 14 MI New York vs. Texas Super Kings 8:30 p.m. ET

Tuesday, July 16 MI New York vs. Washington Freedom 8:30 p.m. ET

Thursday, July 18 MI New York vs. San Francisco Unicorns 8:30 p.m. ET

Sunday, July 21 MI New York vs. Los Angeles Knight Riders 8:30 p.m. ET

“The recent triumph of the U.S. cricket team over Pakistan in the ICC T20 World Cup has ignited a nationwide cricket frenzy,” stated Todd Myers, COO of Willow by Cricbuzz. “In a strategic move to leverage this surge in interest, Willow by Cricbuzz and the YES Network have joined forces. This alliance will not only showcase the MLC and MI New York on a grand scale but also enhance the sport’s visibility and accessibility. This transformative collaboration is poised to propel cricket’s skyrocketing popularity across the U.S. and invigorate a thriving fan base.”

“We are excited to welcome Major League Cricket and defending champion MI New York to the YES Network,” said Jon Litner, CEO, YES Network. “As sports fans around the world currently enjoy the ICC T20 World Cup, YES is delighted to partner with Willow by Cricbuzz to capitalize on the growing interest in the sport of cricket in the New York area by showcasing MI New York to sports fans throughout our territory.” YES Network
summary:
**Tournament Details:**

* The upcoming MLC season will feature the defending champion MI New York, led by Kieron Pollard.
* Seven matches featuring MI New York will be broadcast on the YES Network and Willow by Cricbuzz's TV network and streaming platform.
* The partnership between YES Network and Willow by Cricbuzz will bring MLC action to New York State, Connecticut, northeastern Pennsylvania, and north and central New Jersey.

**Schedule:**

* The season-opener will take place on Friday, July 5, with MI New York facing the Seattle Orcas at 3:30 p.m. ET.
* The remaining six matches featuring MI New York will be broadcast on the following dates:
	+ July 6: MI New York vs. Washington Freedom
	+ July 12: MI New York vs. Texas Super Kings
	+ July 14: MI New York vs. Texas Super Kings
	+ July 16: MI New York vs. Washington Freedom
	+ July 18: MI New York vs. San Francisco Unicorns
	+ July 21: MI New York vs. Los Angeles Knight Riders
